Sentencas: The advancement of electrode materials exhibiting high catalytic activity is crucial for the application of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) and lithium-ion batteries (LIBs).
Titulo: Anion doping-induced enhancement of electrochemical catalysis in NiCo2O4 for energy conversion and storage

Sentencas: Herein, the anion substitution strategy is used to enhance the electrochemical catalytic activity of spinel oxide NiCo2O4.
Titulo: Anion doping-induced enhancement of electrochemical catalysis in NiCo2O4 for energy conversion and storage

Sentencas: For the first time, F-doped NiCo2O3F (NCOF) was synthesized and systematically studied as the electrode for both SOFCs and LIBs.
Titulo: Anion doping-induced enhancement of electrochemical catalysis in NiCo2O4 for energy conversion and storage

Sentencas: The results demonstrate a noticeable increase in both the content of oxygen vacancies and the unit cell free volume after F doping.
Titulo: Anion doping-induced enhancement of electrochemical catalysis in NiCo2O4 for energy conversion and storage

Sentencas: Simultaneously, there is a reduction in the band gap width, consequently significantly enhancing the conductivity of NCO.
Titulo: Anion doping-induced enhancement of electrochemical catalysis in NiCo2O4 for energy conversion and storage

Sentencas: These changes are beneficial to the oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) process.
Titulo: Anion doping-induced enhancement of electrochemical catalysis in NiCo2O4 for energy conversion and storage

Sentencas: At 750 degrees C, the Rp of NCOF is 0.05 ohm cm(2), exhibiting a reduction of 61.5 % compared to NCO.
Titulo: Anion doping-induced enhancement of electrochemical catalysis in NiCo2O4 for energy conversion and storage

Sentencas: F doping accelerates the process of charge transfer and the adsorption/dissociation of oxygen.
Titulo: Anion doping-induced enhancement of electrochemical catalysis in NiCo2O4 for energy conversion and storage

Sentencas: At 800 degrees C, NCOF exhibits an output performance of 0.85 W cm(2), which is 46.6 % higher than that of NCO.
Titulo: Anion doping-induced enhancement of electrochemical catalysis in NiCo2O4 for energy conversion and storage

Sentencas: Simultaneously, the initial discharge specific capacity of NCOF-based LIB reaches 1395 mAh/g at a current density of 100 mA g(-1).
Titulo: Anion doping-induced enhancement of electrochemical catalysis in NiCo2O4 for energy conversion and storage

Sentencas: F doping demonstrates a noteworthy improvement in both insertion potential and cycling performance.
Titulo: Anion doping-induced enhancement of electrochemical catalysis in NiCo2O4 for energy conversion and storage

Sentencas: As a result, the NCOF electrode exhibits exceptional rate capability, highlighting its enhanced ability to efficiently handle charging and discharging processes over multiple cycles.
Titulo: Anion doping-induced enhancement of electrochemical catalysis in NiCo2O4 for energy conversion and storage

Sentencas: These findings suggest that NCOF holds significant potential as an advanced electrode material for both SOFC and LIBs.
Titulo: Anion doping-induced enhancement of electrochemical catalysis in NiCo2O4 for energy conversion and storage

Sentencas: This study introduces fresh perspectives for designing and developing high catalytic activity multifunctional electrodes for energy conversion and storage devices in the future.
Titulo: Anion doping-induced enhancement of electrochemical catalysis in NiCo2O4 for energy conversion and storage
